title: Olympic Barbell
shortDescription: Durable Olympic barbell for strength training.
description: This high-quality Olympic barbell is perfect for powerlifting, deadlifts, and squats. Designed with knurled grips and smooth rotating sleeves for professional use.

title: Push-Up Bar Set
shortDescription: Ergonomic push-up bars to enhance workouts.
description: Sturdy and non-slip push-up bars help reduce wrist strain while allowing a deeper push-up for better chest and core activation.

title: Leg Press Machine
shortDescription: Heavy-duty leg press for lower body strength.
description: Commercial-grade leg press machine designed to build powerful quads, hamstrings, and glutes with maximum safety and comfort.

title: Chest Fly Machine
shortDescription: Isolate chest muscles with this machine.
description: Target your pectoral muscles effectively with this biomechanically accurate chest fly machine, ideal for any home or commercial gym.

title: Treadmill 3000X
description: A robust treadmill with multiple speed levels, incline modes, and a digital interface. Perfect for cardio training and weight loss.

title: Vinyl Dumbbell Set
description: These vinyl-coated dumbbells are ideal for home workouts, light strength training, and aerobic exercises. Comfortable grip and stylish design.

title: Cast Iron Kettlebell
shortDescription: Solid cast-iron kettlebell for dynamic workouts.
description: Enhance your strength and conditioning with this perfectly balanced kettlebell. Suitable for swings, squats, and functional training.

title: Elliptical Trainer Pro
shortDescription: Low-impact cardio elliptical with resistance levels.
description: A quiet, smooth elliptical trainer with multiple resistance settings and a display panel to track time, speed, and calories burned.

title: Indoor Exercise Bike
shortDescription: Sturdy indoor cycling bike with adjustable resistance.
description: This high-performance bike simulates road cycling. Includes adjustable seat and handlebars for comfort, plus LCD display for metrics.

title: Chrome Dumbbell Set
shortDescription: Premium chrome dumbbells for all levels.
description: Sleek and durable chrome-plated dumbbell set perfect for full-body workouts. Compact, rust-resistant, and easy to store.

title: Adjustable Dumbbell
shortDescription: Compact adjustable dumbbell for versatile training.
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbell that allows quick weight changes with a dial system. Ideal for progressive strength training.

title: Leg Curl Machine
shortDescription: Isolated leg curl machine for hamstring workouts.
description: Engineered for maximum comfort and effectiveness, this leg curl machine helps isolate hamstrings with smooth adjustable resistance.

title: Jump Rope Pro
shortDescription: High-speed jump rope for cardio and agility.
description: Tangle-free, adjustable jump rope with ball-bearing handles for smooth rotation. Perfect for HIIT, cardio, and endurance training.
